description:
Hayuu Reiko is a student at Ushio`s junior high school that is known as someone who doesn`t want to live, due to the fact that she has attempted suicide multiple timees. One day, Ushio goes with Asako and others to an art exhibit of his favorite painter, and the portraits of Reiko catches his eye. Ushio eventually finds out that the Reiko in the portraits is the same Reiko that goes to his school, and asks her to be his model for his paintings. However, he finds out that death seems to follow those who try to get too close to her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Demon That Dwells in the Painting
